publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-675.3 Tommy Sheridan: Genetic Modification Science—As an amendment to motion (S1M-675) in the name of Susan Deacon, leave out from "commends" to and insert "would welcome a precautionary approach by the Scottish Executive and therefore calls, as part of this approach, for a five year moratorium on the growing and import of genetically modified food and crops as the only effective way of dealing with the public’s concern."
